alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:52AM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Widespread street flooding will continue to impact travel across the warned area. Although heavy rain has stopped, floodwaters will take time to recede. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following counties, Harris and Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 415 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 251 AM CST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Humble, Jersey Village, Greater Greenspoint, Aldine, Spring, northwestern Northside / Northline, Kingwood, Hidden Valley, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Acres Home, Greater Inwood, Splashtown, Willowbrook, Independence Heights, Central Northwest, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing, Langwood, Lazybrook / Timbergrove, Spring Branch East and Lake Houston. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
